channel.title: How do I fix this kinda easy error?
channel.description:
Hi, I want to replace:
[code]sendQuest("@bla@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ " +server.playerHandler.players[i].playerLevel[24]+ "@bla@ Rank @red@" +server.playerHandler.players[i].playerLevel[22], 8147+i);[/code]
With this:
[code]sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red@+playerLevel[22]", 8147+i);[/code]
Why do I get this error?
[code]client.java:43: illegal start of expression sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: <identifier> expected sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: <identifier> expected sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: illegal start of type sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: not a statement sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: ';' expected sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ 6 errors Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thanks

item.title: How do I fix this kinda easy error?
item.dc:creator: @r.v.d.p r.v.d.p
item.description:
@r.v.d.p wrote:

sendQuest("@bla@"+playerName+" @whi@Total Lvl: @gre@ "+totalz+"@bla@   Rank @red@"+playerLevel[22], 8147+i);

to start, loads of " where placed at the wrong place, then, some + where also wrong, try the line i typed out

item.title: How do I fix this kinda easy error?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi, I want to replace:

sendQuest("@bla@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+ " =  @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ " +server.playerHandler.players[i].playerLevel[24]+ "@bla@   Rank @red@"  +server.playerHandler.players[i].playerLevel[22], 8147+i);

With this:

sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " =  @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@   Rank @red@+playerLevel[22]", 8147+i);

Why do I get this error?

client.java:43: illegal start of expression sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: <identifier> expected sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: <identifier> expected sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: illegal start of type sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: not a statement sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ client.java:43: ';' expected sendQuest("@bla@+playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ +totalz"@bla@ Rank @red @+playerLevel[22]"); ^ 6 errors Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Thanks

Read full topic
